thread.title: Teenager ‘comes back to life’ on the way to his FUNERAL after doctors cut life support
thread.title_full: Teenager ‘comes back to life’ on the way to his FUNERAL after doctors cut life support

title: Teenager ‘comes back to life’ on the way to his FUNERAL after doctors cut life support
text:
Teenager ‘comes back to life’ on the way to his FUNERAL after doctors cut life support Teenager ‘comes back to life’ on the way to his FUNERAL after doctors cut life support A TEENAGE boy shocked his family after opening his eyes and breathing heavily on the way to his own funeral. PUBLISHED: 16:53, Tue, Feb 21, 2017 | UPDATED: 17:53, Tue, Feb 21, 2017 GETTY FILE PIUCTRE He was being taken to his home village as locals prepared for his funeral 
Kumar Marewad was admitted to hospital in southwest India last week after being bitten by a dog and developing a fever. 
But doctors at the Dharwad hospital gave up hope on the 17-year-old after discovering the infection caused by the bite had spread through his body. 
His grief stricken parents decided to take their doctor’s advice and bring their child home to Manahundi village, knowing that he would soon pass after he was taken off life support. 
Kumar’s brother-in-law Sharanappa Naikar said: "We had decided to take Kumar home after doctors told us his chances of survival were bleak once taken off the ventilator”. GETTY FILE PICUTRE His family could not see any signs of life in the teenager Medical breakthroughs: Nine of the most modern miracles Thu, September 8, 2016 Incredible medical breakthroughs leading to promising new treatments are just around the corner. Take a look at some of the most recent discoveries.
